panels.description: The capacity of all block cache in your application.
panels.title: Total block cache capacity

panels.description: The memory size of the entries residing in all block cache in bytes.
panels.title: Total block cache usage

panels.description: The memory size for the entries being pinned in all block cache in bytes.
panels.title: Total block cache pinned usage

panels.description: The approximate size of active, unflushed immutable, and pinned immutable all memtables in bytes.
panels.title: Total size of all memtables

panels.description: The number of immutable memtables that have not yet been flushed.
panels.title: Number immutable memtables

panels.description: The approximate size of active and unflushed immutable all memtables in bytes.
panels.title: Total size of all SST files

panels.description: The total estimated number of keys in the active and unflushed immutable memtables and storage.
panels.title: Total number of keys

panels.description: This metric reports 1 if at least one compaction is pending, otherwise it reports 0.
panels.title: Compaction pending

panels.description: This metric reports 1 if a memtable flush is pending, otherwise it reports 0.
panels.title: Memtable flush pending

panels.description: The total number of background errors.
panels.title: Number of background errors

panels.description: The capacity of all block cache in your application.
panels.title: Total block cache capacity

panels.description: The memory size of the entries residing in all block cache in bytes.
panels.title: Total block cache usage

panels.description: The approximate size of active, unflushed immutable, and pinned immutable all memtables in bytes.
panels.title: Total size of all memtables

panels.description: The total estimated number of keys in the active and unflushed immutable memtables and storage.
panels.title: Total number of keys

panels.description: The estimated number of keys in the active and unflushed immutable memtables and storage.
panels.title: Number of keys in active & unflushed storage

panels.description: The estimated total number of bytes a compaction needs to rewrite on disk to get all levels down to under target size (only valid for level compaction).
panels.title: Estimate pending compaction bytes

panels.description: The total number of background errors.
panels.title: RocksDb background errors

panels.description: The approximate size of active, unflushed immutable, and pinned immutable memtables in bytes.
panels.title: Size All MemTables

panels.description: The approximate size of the active memtable in bytes.
panels.title: Active size memtable

panels.description: The number of entries in the active memtable.
panels.title: Number of entries in active memtable

panels.description: The number of immutable memtables that have not yet been flushed.
panels.title: Number of immutable memtables yet not flushed

panels.description: The number of entries in the unflushed immutable memtables.
panels.title: Number of entries in unflushed memtable

panels.description: The number of delete entries in the active memtable.
panels.title: Number of delete entries in active memtable

panels.description: The number of delete entries in the unflushed immutable memtables.
panels.title: Number of delete entries in unflushed memtable

panels.description: The memory size of the entries residing in block cache in bytes.
panels.title: Block Cache Usage

panels.description: The memory size for the entries being pinned in the block cache in bytes.
panels.title: Block Cache Pinned Usage

panels.description: The capacity of the block cache in bytes.
panels.title: Block Cache Capacity

panels.description: The total size in bytes of all Sorted Sequence Table (SST) files.
panels.title: Total SST files

panels.description: The total size in bytes of all Sorted Sequence Table (SST) files that belong to the latest log-structured merge (LSM) tree.
panels.title: Live SST files

panels.description: The estimated memory in bytes used for reading Sorted Sequence Tables (SSTs), excluding memory used in block cache.
panels.title: Estimate memory used for reading SSTs

panels.description: Number of live versions of the log-structured merge (LSM) tree.
panels.title: Number live versions of LSM Tree

panels.description: The average number of bytes written per second to the RocksDB state store.
panels.title: Bytes Written Rate

panels.description: The average number of bytes read per second from the RocksDB state store.
panels.title: Bytes Read Rate

panels.description: The average number of bytes flushed per second from the memtable to disk.
panels.title: Memtable Flushed Rate

panels.description: The ratio of block cache hits for data blocks, relative to all lookups for data blocks to the block cache.
panels.title: Block cache data hit ratio

panels.description: The ratio of block cache hits for filter blocks, relative to all lookups for filter blocks to the block cache.
panels.title: Block cache filter hit ratio

panels.description: The ratio of block cache hits for index blocks, relative to all lookups for index blocks to the block cache.
panels.title: Block cache index hit ratio

panels.description: The ratio of memtable hits, relative to all lookups to the memtable.
panels.title: Memtable hit ratio

panels.description: The number of current open files.
panels.title: Number of open files

panels.description: The total number of file errors that occurred.
panels.title: Number of error files
